content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the **wheat stitch™ keychain & lanyard** pattern is the perfect way to bring cozy crochet texture into your everyday life using my * signature wheat stitch™ 1 * this quick and satisfying project adds handmade charm to your keys bags or badge lanyard and it makes a beautiful practical gift worked flat in row these accessories are designed with the same stitch texture loved in the wheat stitch scarf and other matching projects you ll start with a simple foundation and build up that signature wheat-inspired texture one row at a time whether you re new to the stitch or already hooked this is a relaxing make that s easy to finish in an afternoon a video tutorial is included in the pattern 2 **crochet hook ** g 4 0mm - or size to meet gauge 3 **notions ** removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 swivel clasp 7 **yarn ** village yarn craft cotton yarn 8 100% cotton 115yds/71g **yarn quantities ** small large wristlet 15 20 yds short long lanyard 25 35 yds **yarn substitutions ** premier home cotton 9 - 85% cotton 15% polyester 131yds/75g lily sugar n cream 10 - 100% cotton 120yds/71g wecrochet dishie 11 - 100% cotton 190yds/100g herrschners cottage cotton 12 - 60% cotton 40% acrylic blend 207yds/100g **abbreviations ** blo- back loop only chain - chain rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side **gauge ** not critical for this design 17 sts and 12 row = 4 in stitch pattern not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 **sizes ** s/l wristlet or s/l lanyard **skill level ** advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 17 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 19 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner we understand that you may want to put your spin on things if you re feeling adventurous and want to make tweaks like using different yarn or adjusting sizing go for it however we
